text: willow_rosenberg No ! Get off !
buffy_summers Hey !
willow_rosenberg Xander !
willow_rosenberg Xander , are you okay ?
xander_harris Man , something hit me .
buffy_summers Where 's Jesse ?
willow_rosenberg I do n't know ! They surrounded us .
xander_harris That girl grabbed him and took off .
buffy_summers Which way ?
xander_harris I do n't know .
buffy_summers Jesse .
werewolf Howl .

rupert_giles This world is older than any of you know . Contrary to popular mythology , it did not begin as a paradise . For untold eons demons walked the Earth . They made it their home , their ... their Hell . But in time they lost their purchase on this reality . The way was made for mortal animals , for , for man . All that remains of the old ones are vestiges , certain magicks , certain creatures .
buffy_summers And vampires .
xander_harris Okay , this is where I have a problem . See , because we 're talking about vampires . We 're having a * talk * with vampires in it .
willow_rosenberg Is n't that what we saw last night ?

buffy_summers No . No , th - those were n't vampires , those were just guys in thundering need of a facial . Or maybe they had rabies . It could have been rabies . A - and that guy turning to dust ? Just a trick of light . That 's exactly what I said the first time I saw a vampire . Well , after I was done with the screaming part .
willow_rosenberg Oh , I - I need to sit down .
buffy_summers You are sitting down .
willow_rosenberg Oh . Good for me .
xander_harris So vampires are demons ?

rupert_giles The books tell the last demon to leave this reality fed off a human , mixed their blood . He was a human form possessed , infected by the demon 's soul . He bit another , and another , and so they walk the Earth , feeding ... Killing some , mixing their blood with others to make more of their kind . Waiting for the animals to die out , and the old ones to return .
luke Move !
the_master Is this for me ?
luke An offering , Master .
darla He 's a good one ! His blood is pure !
the_master You 've tasted it .
the_master I 'm your ... faithful dog . You bring me scraps .
darla I , I did n't mean it .

the_master I have waited . For three score years I have waited . While you come and go I am stuck here , here in this house of ... worship ! My ascension is almost at hand . Pray that when it comes ... I 'm in a better mood .
darla Master , forgive me ! We had more offerings , but there was trouble . A girl !
luke And there was a girl . She fought well and she knew of our breed . It is possible that she may be ... .
the_master A Slayer !
xander_harris And that would be a what ?
rupert_giles For as long as there have been vampires , there 's been the Slayer . One girl in all the world , a Chosen One .
buffy_summers He loves doing this part .
rupert_giles Alright . The Slayer hunts vampires , Buffy is a Slayer , do n't tell anyone . Well , I think that 's all the vampire information you need .
xander_harris Except for one thing : how do you kill them ?
buffy_summers * You * do n't , * I * do .
xander_harris Well , Jesse 's my .
buffy_summers Jesse is * my * responsibility . I let him get taken .
xander_harris That 's not true .
willow_rosenberg If you had n't shown up they would have taken us , too . Does anybody mind if I pass out ?
buffy_summers Breathe .
willow_rosenberg Breathe .

buffy_summers Breathe . This big guy , Luke . He talked about an offering to the Master . Now , I do n't know what or who , but if they were n't just feeding then Jesse may still be alive . I 'm gon na find him .
willow_rosenberg Uh , this may be the dumb question , but should n't we call the police ?
rupert_giles And they 'd believe us , of course .
willow_rosenberg Well , we do n't have to say vampires . We , we could just say that there 's a , a bad man .
buffy_summers They could n't handle it even of they did show up . They 'd only come with guns .
rupert_giles You have no idea where they took Jesse ?
buffy_summers I looked around , but soon as they got clear of the graveyard , they could have just , voom !
xander_harris They can fly ?
buffy_summers They can drive .
xander_harris Oh .
willow_rosenberg I do n't remember hearing a car .
rupert_giles Let 's take an enormous intuitive leap , shall we , and say they went underground .
buffy_summers Vampires really jam on sewer systems . You can get anywhere in the entire town without catching any rays . But I did n't see any access around there .
xander_harris Well , there 's an electrical tunnel that runs under the whole town .
rupert_giles If we had a diagnostic of the tunnel system it might indicate a , a meeting place , it would , uh ... I suppose we could go to the building commission .
buffy_summers We * so * do n't have time .
willow_rosenberg Uh , guys ? There may be another way .
the_master A Slayer ! Have you any proof ?
luke Only that she fought me , and yet lives .
the_master Hmm , very nearly proof enough . I ca n't remember the last time that happened .
luke 1843 . Madrid . He caught me sleeping .
the_master She must n't be allowed to interfere with the Harvest !
luke I would never let that happen !
the_master Do n't worry about it . I believe she 'll come to us . We have something she wants .
the_master If she is a Slayer , and this boy lives , she 'll try to save him .
luke I thought you nothing more than a meal , boy .
luke Congratulations , you 've just been upgraded . To bait .
buffy_summers There it is .
willow_rosenberg That runs under the graveyard .
xander_harris I do n't see any access .
rupert_giles So , all the city plans are just , uh , open to the public ?
willow_rosenberg Um , well , i - in a way . I sort of stumbled onto them when I accidentally decrypted the city council 's security system .
xander_harris Someone 's been naughty .
buffy_summers There 's nothing here , this is useless !
rupert_giles I think you 're being a bit hard on yourself .
buffy_summers You 're the one that told me that I was n't prepared enough . Understatement ! I thought I was on top of everything , and then that monster , Luke , came out of nowhere ... .
xander_harris What ?

buffy_summers He did n't come out of nowhere . He came from behind me . I was facing the entrance , he came from behind me , and he did n't follow me out . The access to the tunnels is in the mausoleum ! The girl must have doubled back with Jesse after I got out ! God ! I am so mentally challenged !
xander_harris So , what 's the plan ? We saddle up , right ?
buffy_summers There 's no ' we ' , okay ? I 'm the Slayer , and you 're not .
xander_harris I knew you 'd throw that back in my face .
buffy_summers Xander , this is deeply dangerous .
xander_harris I 'm inadequate . That 's fine . I 'm less than a man .
willow_rosenberg Buffy , I 'm not anxious to go into a dark place full of monsters . But I do want to help . I need to .

rupert_giles Well , then help me . I 've been researching this Harvest affair . It seems to be some sort of preordained massacre . Rivers of blood , Hell on Earth , quite charmless . I 'm a bit fuzzy , however , on the details . It may be that you can wrest some information from that dread machine .
rupert_giles That was a bit , um , British , was n't it ?
buffy_summers Welcome to the New World .
rupert_giles I want you to go on the ' Net .
willow_rosenberg Oh , sure , I can do that .
buffy_summers Then I 'm outta here . If Jesse 's alive , I 'll bring him back .
rupert_giles Do I have to tell you to be careful ?
principal_bob_flutie And where do we think we 're going ?
buffy_summers We ? I ... . Me ... .
principal_bob_flutie We 're not leaving school grounds , are we ?
buffy_summers No ! No , I 'm ... just admiring the fence . You know , this is quality fence work .

principal_bob_flutie Because if we were leaving schools grounds on our second day at a new school , after getting kicked out of our old school for delinquent behavior ... Do you see where I 'm going with this ?
buffy_summers Mr. Giles ... .
principal_bob_flutie What ?
buffy_summers He asked me to get a book for him . Uh , from the store , 'cause I have a free period , and I 'm a big reader . Did it mention that in my transcripts ?
principal_bob_flutie Mr. Giles ?
buffy_summers Ask him .

principal_bob_flutie Well , maybe that 's how they do things in * Britain * , they 've got that royal family and all kinds of problems , but here at Sunnydale nobody leaves campus while school 's in session . Are we clear ?
buffy_summers We 're clear .
principal_bob_flutie That 's the Buffy Summers I want in my school . Sensible girl with her feet on the ground !
willow_rosenberg Murder , death , disaster . What else ?
xander_harris Paranormal , unexplained , did you get natural disasters ?
willow_rosenberg Earthquake , flood .
xander_harris Rain of Toads .
willow_rosenberg Right .
xander_harris Rain of Toads ! Do you think they 'd have anything like that in the paper ?
willow_rosenberg I 'll put it on the computer search . If it 's in there , it 'll turn up . Anything that 'll lead us to vampires .
xander_harris And I , in the meantime , will help by standing around like an idiot .
willow_rosenberg Not like an idiot , just ... standing . Buffy does n't want you getting hurt .
willow_rosenberg I do n't want you getting hurt .
xander_harris This is just too much . I mean , yesterday my life 's like , ' Uh - oh , pop quiz . ' Today it 's ' Rain of Toads ' .
willow_rosenberg I know . And everyone else thinks it 's just a normal day .
xander_harris Nobody knows . It 's like we 've got this big secret .
willow_rosenberg We do . That 's what a secret is , when you know something other guys do n't .
xander_harris Right . Look , maybe you should get to class .
willow_rosenberg You mean ' we ' . We should get to class .
xander_harris Yeah .
willow_rosenberg Buffy'll be okay . Whatever 's down there , I think she can handle it .
xander_harris Yeah , I do , too .
willow_rosenberg So do I !
buffy_summers I do n't suppose you 've got a key on you ?
angel They really do n't like me dropping in .
buffy_summers Why not ?
angel They really do n't like me .
buffy_summers How could that possibly be ?
angel I knew you 'd figure out this entryway sooner or later . Actually , I thought it was gon na be a * little * sooner .
buffy_summers Sorry you had to wait . Okay . Look , if you 're gon na be popping up with this Cryptic Wise Man act on a regular basis , can you at least tell me your name ?
angel Angel .
buffy_summers Angel . It 's a pretty name .
angel Do n't ... go down there .
buffy_summers Deal with my going .
angel You should n't be putting yourself at risk . Tonight is the Harvest . Unless you can prevent it , the Master walks .
buffy_summers Well , if this Harvest thing is such a suckfest , why do n't * you * stop it ?
angel 'Cause I 'm afraid .
angel They 'll be expecting you .
buffy_summers I 've got a friend down there . Or at least a potential friend . Do you know what it 's like to have a friend ?
buffy_summers That was n't supposed to be a stumper .
angel When you hit the tunnels head east towards the school . That 's where you 're likely to find them .
buffy_summers You gon na wish me luck ?
angel Good luck !
xander_harris Did you see anything ?
buffy_summers Xander , what are you doing here ? !
xander_harris Something stupid . I followed you .
buffy_summers Well , you .
xander_harris I could n't just sit at home and do nothing .
buffy_summers I understand . Now , go away !
xander_harris No !
buffy_summers Xander , you 're gon na have to .
xander_harris Look , Jesse 's my bud , okay ? If I can help him out , that 's what I got ta do .
xander_harris Besides , it 's this or chem class .
xander_harris Okay , so , crosses , garlic , stake through the heart .
buffy_summers That 'll get it done .
xander_harris Cool ! Of course , I do n't actually have any of those things .
buffy_summers Good thinking .
xander_harris Well , the part of my brain that would tell me to bring that stuff is still busy telling me not to come down here . I have this , though .
buffy_summers Turn that off !
xander_harris Okay ! Okay ! So , what else ?
buffy_summers What else what ?
xander_harris For vampire slayage .
buffy_summers Oh , fire , beheading , sunlight , holy water , the usual .
xander_harris You 've done some beheading in your time ?

buffy_summers Oh , yeah . There was this time I was pinned down by this guy that played left tackle for varsity ... . Well , at least he used to before he was a vampire ... . Anyway , he had this really , really thick neck , and all I had was a little , little Exact - O knife ... .
buffy_summers You 're not loving this story .
xander_harris No , actually , I find it oddly comforting .
rupert_giles ' For they will gather and be gathered . From the Vessel pours life . ' P ... . Pours life ... .
rupert_giles ' On the night of the crescent moon , the first past the solstice it will come ... ' Of course . That 's tonight !
cordelia_chase No ! It 's supposed to find the syntax and match it . Or wait ... .
harmony_kendall Are we going to the Bronze tonight ?
cordelia_chase No , we 're going to the other cool place in Sunnydale .
cordelia_chase Of course we 're going to the Bronze . Friday night ? No cover ? But you should have been there last night . 'Cause I ran into Buffy ... .
cordelia_chase ... and can she be any weirder ? She attacked me ! Do you believe it ?
harmony_kendall I think we did this part wrong .
cordelia_chase Why do we have to devise these programs , is n't that what nerds are for ? What 'd she do ?
harmony_kendall Uh , she 's doing something else .
cordelia_chase Okay , and then pattern run , right ? Or go to end ? That 's it !
harmony_kendall Maybe !
cordelia_chase So anyway , I come outta the bathroom , and she comes running at me . Screaming ! With a stick ! ' I 'm gon na kill you ! I 'm gon na kill you ! ' I swear !
boy Who ?
cordelia_chase Buffy !
harmony_kendall The new girl ?
boy What 's her deal ?
cordelia_chase Well , she 's crazed .
harmony_kendall Did you hear about her old school ?
harmony_kendall Booted .
cordelia_chase Well , I exhibit no surprise .
boy Why was she kicked out ?
cordelia_chase Uh , because she 's a psycho loony !
willow_rosenberg No , she 's not .
cordelia_chase What ?
willow_rosenberg She 's not a psycho . You do n't even know her .
cordelia_chase Excuse me ? Who gave you permission to exist ?
cordelia_chase Do I horn in on your private discussions ? No . Why ? Because you 're boring .
harmony_kendall Okay , I think the program 's done .
cordelia_chase Finally the nightmare ends ! Okay , so how do we save it ?
willow_rosenberg Deliver .
cordelia_chase Deliver ? Where 's that ? Oh !
buffy_summers They 're close .
xander_harris How can you tell ?
buffy_summers No more rats .
xander_harris Jesse !
buffy_summers Oh , no !
xander_harris J - J - Jesse !
jesse Xander !
xander_harris Jesse , man , are you okay ?
jesse I am not okay , on an * epic * scale .
jesse We got ta get outta here !
xander_harris It 's cool , Buffy 's a superhero .
buffy_summers Hold on ... .
xander_harris Do you think anyone heard that ?
jesse They knew you were gon na come . They said that I ... I was the bait .
xander_harris Oh , great , now you tell us .
buffy_summers Oops !
jesse Oh , no , no , no , no !
buffy_summers Do you know another way out ?
jesse I dunno . Maybe . C'mon !
jesse Wait , wait . They brought me through here , there , there should be a way up . I hope !
buffy_summers I do n't think this is the way out !
xander_harris We ca n't fight our way back through those things . What do we do ?
jesse I got an idea . You can die !
xander_harris Jesse , man . I 'm sorry .
jesse Sorry ? I feel good , Xander ! I feel strong ! I 'm connected , man , to everything !
jesse I , I can hear the worms in the earth !
xander_harris That 's a plus .
jesse I know what the Master wants . I 'll serve his purpose . That means you die . And I feed .
buffy_summers Xander , the cross !
xander_harris Jesse , man . We 're buds , do n't you remember ?
jesse You 're like a shadow to me now .
xander_harris Then get outta my face .
buffy_summers Help me !
buffy_summers We need to get out of here !
xander_harris There is no out of here !
xander_harris Up there !
buffy_summers Go !
buffy_summers Xander , pull !
the_master She escaped ? She walks free when I should be drinking her heart 's blood right now ? Careless ... .
colin Master , we had her trapped !
the_master Oh , are you going to make excuses ?

the_master You are all weak . It has been too long since you have faced the Slayer . Huh . It is no matter to me . She will not stop the Harvest . Just means there 'll be someone worth killing ... when I reach the surface . Is Luke ready ?
colin He waits .
the_master It 's time . Bring him to me .
the_master Ah , Colin ... You failed me . Tell me you 're sorry .
colin I 'm sorry !
the_master There . That was n't so bad , was it ? Hold on ... .
the_master You 've got something in your eye .
rupert_giles Buffy ?
willow_rosenberg It 's just me . So there 's no word ?
rupert_giles Ah , not as yet , no .
willow_rosenberg Well , I - I'm sure they 're ... great .
rupert_giles Did you find anything of interest ?
willow_rosenberg I think , maybe ... I surfed through the old newspapers around the time of that big earthquake back in ' 37 ? And for several months before there were a rash of murders .
rupert_giles Great ! I - I mean , well , not , not ' great ' in a good way , uh , um , uh , go on ?
willow_rosenberg Well , they sound like the kind you were looking for . Throats , blood ... .
rupert_giles It 's all coming together . I rather wish it were n't .
the_master My blood is your blood . My soul is your soul .
luke My body is your instrument .
the_master On this ... most hallowed night ... we are as one . Luke is the Vessel !
the_master Every soul he takes will feed me . And their souls will grant me the strength to free myself . Tonight I shall walk the Earth , and the stars themselves will hide !
willow_rosenberg Did you find Jesse ?
xander_harris Yeah .
willow_rosenberg Was he dead ?
buffy_summers Worse . I 'm sorry , Willow . We were too late . And they were waiting for us .
willow_rosenberg At least you two are okay .
xander_harris I do n't like vampires . I 'm gon na take a stand and say they 're not good .
buffy_summers So , Giles ! Got anything that can make this day any worse ?
rupert_giles How about the end of the world ?
buffy_summers Knew I could count on you .
rupert_giles This is what we know . Some sixty years ago , a very old , very powerful vampire came to this shore , not just to feed .
buffy_summers He came 'cause this town 's a mystical who 's it .

rupert_giles Yes . The Spanish who first settled here called it ' Boca del Infierno ' . Roughly translated , ' Hellmouth ' . It 's a sort of , um , portal between this reality and the next . This vampire hopes to open it .
buffy_summers Bring the demons back .
xander_harris End of the world .
willow_rosenberg But he blew it ! Or , I mean , there was an earthquake that swallowed half the town , and him , too .
rupert_giles You see , opening dimensional portals is a tricky business . Odds are he got himself stuck , rather like a , uh , cork in a bottle .
xander_harris And this Harvest thing is to get him out .

rupert_giles It comes once in a century , on this night . The Master can draw power from one of his minions while it feeds . Enough power to break free and open the portal . The minion is called the Vessel , and he bears this symbol .
buffy_summers So , I dust anyone sporting that symbol , and no Harvest .
rupert_giles Simply put , yes .
buffy_summers Any idea where this little get - together is being held ?
rupert_giles There , there are a number of possibilities .
xander_harris They 're goin' to the Bronze .
willow_rosenberg Are you sure ?
xander_harris Come on . All those tasty young morsels all over the place ? Anyway , that 's where Jesse 's gon na be , trust me .
rupert_giles Then we should get there . The sun will be down before long .
buffy_summers I got ta make a stop . Wo n't take long .
rupert_giles What for ?
buffy_summers Supplies .
joyce_summers Buffy ?
buffy_summers Mom !
joyce_summers You 're going out ?
buffy_summers I have to .
joyce_summers I did n't hear you come in last night .
buffy_summers I was really quiet .
joyce_summers It 's happening again , is n't it ? I got a call from your new principal . Says you missed some classes today ?
buffy_summers I was running an errand .
joyce_summers We have n't finished unpacking , and I 'm getting calls from the principal .
buffy_summers Mom , I promise , it is * not * gon na be like before . But I * have * to go .
joyce_summers No .
buffy_summers Mom ? !
joyce_summers The tapes all say I should get used to saying it . No .
buffy_summers This is really , really important .
joyce_summers I know . If you do n't go out it 'll be the end of the world . Everything is life or death when you 're a sixteen - year - old girl .
buffy_summers Look , I do n't have time to talk about this ... .

joyce_summers Buffy , you 've got all the time in the world , you 're not going anywhere . Now , if you wanna stay up here and sulk , I wo n't hold it against you . But if you wanna come down , I 'll make us some dinner .

cordelia_chase Senior boys are the only way to go . Guys from our grade , forget about it , they 're children . Y'know ? Like Jesse . Did you see him last night , following me around like a little puppy dog . You just wanna put him to sleep . But senior boys , hmm , they have mystery . They have ... What 's the word I 'm searching for ? Cars ! I just am not the type to settle . Y'know ? It 's like when I go shopping . I have to have the most expensive thing . Not because it 's expensive , but because it costs more .
girl You know , I.
cordelia_chase Hello , Miss Motormouth , can I get a sentence finished ? Oh , I love this song ! Come on !
cordelia_chase Uh , what do you want ?
cordelia_chase Hey ! Hello ! Caveman brain ! What are you doing ?
jesse Shut up !
cordelia_chase Well , just one dance .
Doorman Need ID . Hey ! Nobody gets inside until I get some sorta .
luke Get inside .
luke Ladies and Gentlemen ! There is no cause for alarm . Actually , there is cause for alarm . It just wo n't do any good .
cordelia_chase I thought there was n't any band tonight .
luke This is a glorious night ! It is also the last one any of you shall ever see . Bring me the first .
Doorman What do you guys want , man , huh ? You want money ? Man , what 's wrong with your faces ?
luke Watch me , people . Fear is like an elixir . It 's almost like blood .
luke Next !
buffy_summers It 's locked !
rupert_giles We 're too late !
buffy_summers Well I did n't know I was gon na get grounded !
xander_harris Can you break it down ?
buffy_summers No , not that thing . Um ... You guys try the back entrance , and I 'll find my own way .
rupert_giles Right . Come on .
buffy_summers Um , wait ! Guys ! Here ! You get the exit cleared and the people out . That 's all ! Do n't go Wild Bunch on me .
rupert_giles Uh , see you inside , then .
willow_rosenberg No joy !
xander_harris We 've got ta get in there before Jesse does something stupider than usual .
rupert_giles You listen to me ! Jesse is dead ! You have to remember that when you see him , you 're not looking at your friend . You 're looking at the thing that killed him .
the_master Almost free !
the_master Give me moooooore !
jesse This one 's mine !
darla They 're all for the Master .
jesse I do n't get one ?
luke I feel the Master 's strength growing !
luke I feel him rising . Every soul brings him closer ! I need another !
buffy_summers The Vessel .
luke Tonight is his ascension . Tonight will be history at its end ! Yours is a glorious sacrifice ! Degradation most holy . What ? No volunteers ? !
darla Here 's a pretty one .
buffy_summers Oh , I 'm sorry , were you in the middle of something ?
luke You !
buffy_summers You did n't think I 'd miss this . Did you ?
luke I hoped you 'd come .
buffy_summers Be right down !
buffy_summers Okay , Vessel boy . You want blood ?
luke I want yours ! Only yours !
buffy_summers Works for me .
rupert_giles Hurry !
xander_harris C'mon ! Let 's go ! C'mon ! C'mon ! C'mon ! C'mon !
rupert_giles Hurry up ! Come on ! Through this door ! Come on ! This way !
xander_harris Head 's up !
jesse Hold still ! You 're not making this easy !
xander_harris Jesse , man ! Do n't make me do it .
jesse Buddy !
luke I always wanted to kill a Slayer !
rupert_giles One at a time ! Quickly ! Quickly !
rupert_giles We 're going to have to open the front as well !
xander_harris Jesse ! I know there 's still a part of you in there .
jesse Okay ... Let 's deal with this . Jesse was an excruciating loser who could n't get a date with anyone in the sighted community ! Look at me . I 'm a new man !
luke Master ! Taste of this ... and be free !
buffy_summers How 'd it taste ?
willow_rosenberg Get off of him !
jesse Ooo ! Alright . Put me out of my misery . You do n't have the guts .
luke You forget , metal ca n't hurt me .
buffy_summers There 's something you forgot about , too . Sunrise !
buffy_summers It 's in about nine hours , moron !
the_master Noooooooo ! Noooooooo !
angel She did it ! I 'll be damned !
rupert_giles I take it it 's over .
willow_rosenberg Did we win ?
buffy_summers Well , we averted the Apocalypse . I give us points for that .
xander_harris One thing 's for sure : nothing 's ever gon na be the same .

cordelia_chase Well , I heard it was rival gangs . You know , fighting for turf ? But all I can tell you is they were an ugly way of looking . And Buffy , like , knew them ! Which is just too weird . I mean , I do n't even remember that much , but I 'm telling you , it was a freak show !
girl Oh , I wish I 'd been there !
cordelia_chase You should have been there . It was so creepy ... .
buffy_summers What exactly were you expecting ?
xander_harris I do n't know , something . I mean , the dead rose . We should at least have an assembly .
rupert_giles People have a tendency to rationalize what they can and forget what they ca n't .
buffy_summers Believe me , I 've seen it happen .
willow_rosenberg Well , I 'll never forget it , none of it .
rupert_giles Good ! Next time you 'll be prepared .
xander_harris Next time ?
willow_rosenberg Next time is why ?
rupert_giles We 've prevented the Master from freeing himself and opening the Mouth of Hell . That 's not to say he 's going to stop trying . I 'd say the fun is just beginning .
willow_rosenberg More vampires ?
